title: ORNOT’s New Women’s Lightweight Droptail Bib Tight
content:
Perfect for year-round riding and offering sun protection, ORNOT’s full-length, lightweight tights come with UPF 50+. The life-changing, drop-tail functionality allows for bathroom breaks without having to take off your jersey.

Strategically placed seams, along with ORNOT’s dense endurance pad, ensure comfort no matter the length of the ride. Every detail has been considered, from the compressive, bluesign®-approved fabric made from recycled fibers to the Oeko-Tex-certified pad and the super stretchy straps designed to move with you.

You’ll find yourself doing an emergency load of laundry to ensure these are ready for long weekend rides anytime the temperature is between 50 and 75 degrees.

Specs:

  • Droptail functionality for easy bathroom breaks
  • UPF 50+ sun protection – no sunscreen required
  • Constructed with bluesign®-approved recycled fabric which conserves resources and protects the health of the environment, workers and you
  • Oeko-Tex certified endurance pad made with recycled fibers
  • Stretchy and soft bib straps
  • Reflective detailing on the lower legs
  • Temperature range – 50-75
  • Made in Italy

 

See more at ORNOT.
